text: Dahiya (also spelled as Dahia) is an Indian clan found among castes such as Jats of Haryana, Punjab and Uttar Pradesh in India. ==Origin and history== Swami Omanand Saraswati points out that the Jats of Haryana and Western Uttar Pradesh; specially the residents of Tajupur, Dayalpur villages of Gurgaon district and Tatarpur village of Meerut district, belonged to Dahiya or Dheya family. ==References== Category:Jats Category:Social groups of Haryana Category:Surnames Category:Jat clans of Punjab
title: Dahiya (surname)
